1.content:
Katherine watched with a sigh as her son Harry settled into the couch, once again preparing to watch TV or some movie she was sure. Her husband David came around the comer by the stairs and spied Harry lounging and made a move to join him. That was the limit to Katherine's patience she stormed into the den from her observation position in the kitchen fuming. Both men spied her approach and matched the angry expression on her face to memories of stern lectures; each individually loathed what was now expected to come. As Katherine opened her mouth to deliver the opening line of the tirade the rear door slid open and slammed against the frame and the haughty 18 year old beauty Ashley strode into the house a look of distaste on her face. Katherine's anger flared ever hotter as she saw her daughter in one of the skimpiest bikini's she had ever seen. Coming in from tanning on the pool deck behind the house Ashley had hoped to slip inside and avoid her mother, and for that matter the rest of her family.
Katherine launched into her rant that had been for a moment pent up making it all the worse when it finally released. She raged against her daughter for dishonoring the family by dressing like a "whore" and "strutting about with her good on display" David seeing a potential avenue for escape joined into the condemnation feeling far less concerned about his daughter's activities than he showed. This did nothing to avail Katherine's rage for him; she turned on him with the same if not greater force as she had on her daughter. Katherine railed against David for not helping her with housework and other domestic issues. Finally Katherine turned her fury on Harry who had made a vain attempt to slink away while the attention of his mother was focused on others. Katherine railed on him the hardest condemning his laziness and lackluster career progress (he was unemployed and freeloading). With her rage reaching its penultimate Katherine spoke aloud in a voice filled with some combination of anger, despair, and longing, "Oh I wish you would just change".

Who or what Changes

Ashley: https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/236...
David: http://www.surgicalproductsmag.com/sites...

1111.content:
After the yelling had settled down and his mother had stormed off Harry had briefly considered watching the movie like he had been planning but some part of him had realized that would probably not be wise as he would likely run into his mother again. With that in mind he had made his way upstairs into his room where a locked door stood between himself and his mother's wrath. As he settled back onto his bed he briefly gazed about his room hoping to see something to entertain himself for a few hours while his mother cooled off. In one corner hanging from a dusty lamp hung a small collection of medals from his little league days. It had been long years since those days and longer still since Harry had won any awards; his laziness was not a new trait. As his eyes passed over the small collection of medals he noticed one that seemed out of place. It looked out of the ordinary from the otherwise dusty collection that had hung there untouched for near on 12 years. Rising from his bed his minimal curiosity peaked he wandered over to the medals. Sure enough the front most one was completely new to him, picking it up Harry examined it with some interest. After looking over it briefly he decided it had not come from the sports he had played when he was a kid, in fact it had few if any markings on it beyond a human body outlined on either side of the medallion. The outline was crude and seemed blotchy if there was even a word for it. As he lifted it clear of the place where it had been hanging Harry heard a faint buzzer from down the hall. One of the few chores Harry did was his own laundry, his mother had stopped completely when he had turned 19 in another fit of rage. As such Harry had the basic skills of laundry mastered and had been cleaning his clothes. Turning to go to attend to the laundry that was now done Harry briefly had to consider the medallion in his hand. As he turned to go he halfheartedly slipped it into his pocked its cloth neck band left dangling from his pocket.

As he entered the laundry room down the hall from his room Harry noticed that his load in the wash had indeed finished and was ready to be transferred to the dryer. He also took note of the several other loads of laundry he still had to do. Like most guys Harry wore everything until it reached a point where he had to do laundry this time was no different, as one load went into the dryer he began to scrounge around for clothes for his new load. As he bent down to pick up a grey t shirt the medallion popped out of his shorts and landed on the floor. Mildly annoyed Harry grabbed the medallion and in the same motion grabbed the grey t shirt. In the moment his hand clutching the medallion came into contact with the shirt a mild by certainly noticed shock zapped Harry hand. Further annoyed by the medallion Harry laid it down on top of the washer. http://media.very.co.uk/i/very/6P9LR_SQ1...$234x312_standard$ As he moved to toss the shirt in the washer Harry noticed the cut of the shirt and then saw the v neck and realized it was one of his mom's workout shirts. With his current relationship with his mother Harry had no motivation to wash any of his mother's clothes. Tossing the shirt aside Harry found a collection of clothes that would be suitable for washing together. As he did this however he failed the notice the almost imperceptible lengthening of his fingernails and the slight changes to his skin texture. Before he went to leave the room he turned the dial to the proper 60 minute dryer timer and started the load.

14.content:
With those final words, Kathrine stormed off to the master bedroom. As she stormed out Ashley awkwardly sat between her father and brother, all too ashamed to move. As they sat there staring blankly at what was playing on the screen, Kathrine had decided to turn in early for the night. As she laid in bed, she ruminated on what she had done. She knew she was more then in the right with her verbal lashing towards them, but she couldn't help but feel she too was in some way responsible.

         Her husband had been so sweet in their Highschool years. He was kind, caring, and always paying attention to her needs. After graduation they had decided to get married and live out their idyllic life. Things had started fine, she stayed home and managed the upkeep while her husband had worked as an intern. As time went on they just stayed in their roles. As time went on her husband had settled into a routine with his work. She never mentioned this to him before or even tried to drag him away. She had just let him continue this, pouring his all into his work only to come home completely burnt out.

         Even the current state of her kids were partially her fault to. Ashley and David were both polar opposites of each other. Ashley was out going, active, and was always making friends. Her "friends" however, had been people who clearly didn't have the same values as she had tried to instill in her kids. Whenever she had tried to bring this up with Ashley, Ashley would always snap back and shut down. David spent most of his time on the computer, isolated from other people. He had been so sure he could turn his Youtube channel into a career, at least that's what he's said for the last 2 years. Her son was completely unmotivated to do anything other then staring at his screen. She had barely tried to get him away, showing him job listings, and even trying to get him involved in the local community center. He had always shown apathy to the suggestions and gone right back to the computer. She would have tried harder with them, but there were always chores and meals to make.

         The blame for her children and husband not paying attention to her and helping her out hadn't laid solely at their feet, she was to blame as well. She had allowed her husband to pour more into his work then their family and allowed her kids to get away with harmful behavior that lead them to where they are now. As sleep crept up behind her, she only wished that things could change. As she slumbers away, what decides to answer her call?
14.title: Not them, but you

How will they change
151.title: Ashley, Harry

1512.content: There was a small lip the top of the stairs and Ashley caught her foot on it as she lifted her leg the final step. Plummeting forward she landed hard bruising her knee. A small yelp escaped her lips, she was uninjured but it still hurt. Harry reached out a hand to help his sister up. Ashley somewhat grudgingly accepted and allowed herself to be pulled up right by her brother superior strength. It was odd though when she was back up right that he did not let go of her hand. "You can let go my hand now bro" Ashley said with some attitude in their tone. As she said that she looked at Harry's face which bore a very strange expression. "I'm trying but it's stock!" He said with some alarm. Each tried to pull her on back in a vain effort to separate their hands. Ashley almost tripped back and fell on the stairs, but thankfully she still somehow held onto her brother's hand. Both siblings were at this point freaking out and not a little bit confused. Looking closely at each others hands it appeared that they were simply grabbing each others hands. http://teenology101.seattlechildrens.org... But there is so much more that they could not see, nor yet feel.
1512.title: Merge and become one person

15121.content: By the way, will the result be male or female?
15121.title: Melting hands

info.description:
Mother always gets her way in a house with a disinterested husband, a bratty teenage girl, and a lazy 20 year old son.

A tale of transformation, coercement and dark desires.

So dont read if any of that does not appeal to you.
